spell.name: Amber's Iron-Wind Surge

m.text: a melee weapon you are proficient with worth at least 1 cp

entries: You flourish a weapon weapon you are proficient with used in the casting and then vanish to strike like the wind. Choose up to three creatures you can see within range. Make a melee weapon or melee spell attack (your choice) against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 3d8} damage of the weapon's damage type.
You can then teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of one of the targets you hit or missed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd Level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
